data.text: @Transport_gc I’ve been held hostage since Nov 29 https://t.co/B5Mns68ccS
@Transport_gc Stop being so draconian and lift these mandates. The rest of the world is!

@Transport_gc @ServiceCanada_E I think you guys need to suspend your social media accounts and put everyone on calls. How is someone waiting for ei 1/3 of the way through a year.... it's insane lol like what if it was a single mother...
@Transport_gc When doing a lat flow test in the uk and results reported on the NHS website it doesn’t provide all the results ArriveCAN wants, what do you do? Only provides name dob and result
@Transport_gc So how can you violate our passport and our right to travel freely without hindrance?  Asking for a friend you communist twit
